entry.title: Re That's why some people build a delta-neutral position where they buy $1000 $BLUR spot and go short $1000 on futures. Right now and for the last few...
entry.summary: Re That's why some people build a delta-neutral position where they buy $1000 $BLUR spot and go short $1000 on futures. Right now and for the last few days since we've monitored funding rates have been positive meaning you're getting additionally paid to short.
